section.heading: Autonomous vehicles permitted.
section.text: An autonomous vehicle may operate on a public roadway; provided, that the vehicle:

para.text: Has a manual override feature that allows a driver to assume control of the autonomous vehicle at any time;
Has a driver seated in the control seat of the vehicle while in operation who is prepared to take control of the autonomous vehicle at any moment; and
Is capable of operating in compliance with the District’s applicable traffic laws and motor vehicle laws and traffic control devices.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 23-156: § 3 of D.C. Law 23-156 provided that the repeal of this section by § 2(b) of D.C. Law 23-156 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
